description: This file defines a Flutter screen widget (`ReferralsScreen`) that allows users to submit a referral code or generate a new one. It includes UI elements like text fields, buttons, and displays referral details upon successful submission.

classes.name: ReferralsScreen
classes.description: A Flutter widget providing UI for submitting or generating referral codes.

classes.name: _ReferralsScreenState
classes.description: State class managing the UI logic and user interactions for ReferralsScreen.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Disposes of resources used by the state, specifically the text editing controller.

methods.name: _submit
methods.description: Handles submission of a referral code to the referrals service, updates UI based on success or failure.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Constructs the UI layout of the referrals screen, including input fields, buttons, and display of referral results.
